doc.previous: Formally an incidence structure is a triple Incidence structures generalize planes such as affine projective and M bius planes as can be seen from their axiomatic definitions Incidence structures also generalize the higher dimensional analogs and the finite structures are sometimes called finite geometries
doc.after: we say that point p lies on line  Topics in this area include
